definition: to move to and fro (with hand, foot, stick etc)/to fiddle with/to stir up
to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc/to dial/to allocate/to set aside (money)/to poke (the fire)/to pluck (a string instrument)/to turn round/classifier: group, batch
lane/alley
to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with
variant of 弄[long4]
old variant of 弄[nong4]

sentences.english: Look for scratching or fiddling with clothing.
sentences.chinese: 关注抓挠或拨弄衣服的动作。

sentences.english: Dad took the fiddle to the telephone and thumped the strings.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸把小提琴拿到话机旁，重重地拨弄了几下琴弦。

sentences.english: He poked at a pile of ashes with a poker.
sentences.chinese: 他用拨火棍拨弄着一堆灰烬。

sentences.english: Joe sat poking up the sand with a stick and looking very gloomy.
sentences.chinese: 乔坐在那里用小树枝拨弄沙子，一副愁眉苦脸相。

sentences.english: Isabel, with her eyes bent, fingered the pages of M?Ampere.
sentences.chinese: 伊莎贝尔垂下了眼皮，用手指拨弄着安培的书。

sentences.english: He idly plucked the strings of the lute.
sentences.chinese: 他漫不经心地拨弄着鲁特琴的琴弦。

sentences.english: She poked at her meal unenthusiastically.
sentences.chinese: 她无精打采地拨弄着盘中的饭菜。

sentences.english: No points destined eventually fail to beat you and I fiddle with fate.
sentences.chinese: 有缘无分的你我终究拗不过命运的拨弄。

sentences.english: She was always making mischief between them.
sentences.chinese: 她老是在他们之间拨弄是非。

sentences.english: Don't ass about with the computer.
He has been diddling with the controls on the television set.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在瞎拨弄电视机上的开关。

sentences.english: On the way home, Harry fiddled with a calculator while Larry drove.
sentences.chinese: 在回家的路上，拉里开车，哈里拨弄着计算器。

sentences.english: Thus the enthusiastic dumb man thumbed the humble man' s umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 于是热情的哑巴用拇指拨弄谦卑男子的伞。

sentences.english: Someone fiddled with a plate, a poster.
sentences.chinese: 门外有人拨弄一个木牌，通知。

sentences.english: He put his hand in his pocket and jingled some change.
sentences.chinese: 他把手放在口袋里，把几枚硬币拨弄得叮当作响。

sentences.english: He strummed his guitar when he talked to me.
sentences.chinese: 他和我说话时把吉他拨弄响了。

definition: to move back and forth/to fiddle with
to stir/to prod/to poke/to move sideways/to strum (on a guitar etc)
(coll.) to remove (crinkles, dirt) with the palm of the hand
to stroke/to caress
to stroke lightly/to caress
to stroke/to caress
to twirl (in the fingers)
to play with/to finger
to incite/to provoke/to tease
to gently caress and stroke/to pet/to fondle
to tease/to make fun of/to provoke/to stir up (trouble)
variant of 摩挲[mo2 suo1]
(of a breeze) to make (hair, leaves, clothing etc) sway gently/to ruffle
to tease/to provoke/to play with (a child, animal etc)
to wander/to shift around/to waver/to vacillate
to move back and forward/to trade
to push lightly/to flick to one side/to get rid of
